channel.title: How do i removed or disable items help!
channel.description: Hello guys i realy need help recenly on my server the Gold ring is over powerd and i need to remove it or disble it or do somthink to it that stops people from using it if you can help please leave a reply im using the Demise edge pvp source thank. :confused:

item.title: How do i removed or disable items help!
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Also if you wanted an item completely gone you could always put // in front of it or just delete it as a whole.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i removed or disable items help!

item.title: How do i removed or disable items help!
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Find the gold ring in item.cfg, and anything that says 9999 or such just change to your liking. Anything past the first 3 numbers after it are the attack bonuses.

item = itemid description buy price low alch price high alch price stab attack slash attack crush attack magic attack range attack stab def slash def crush def magic def range def strength prayer

I’m not entirely sure if the prices are right, but I think they’re it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i removed or disable items help!
